snippet.title: Game Director Story - Updated Trailer
snippet.description:
Game Director Story is an unflinching and satirical look behind-the-scenes in the gamedev industry and how big-budget AAA games are made. 

Based on first-hand accounts by industry veterans, Players experience the emotional roller coaster of guiding a team through the agonizing decisions and compromises needed to ship a game.

Be sure to check out the game's Steam store page for more information, screenshots and to play the free Demo.

STEAM page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1305180/Game_Director_Story/

Double Blit Games: https://www.doubleblit.com
Double Blit Twitter: https://twitter.com/DoubleBlit
